description:
This plugin add a fully customizable drop down element instead of the default dropdown element of bubble to be work on all browsers

STYLE CUSTOMIZATION SUPPORTED 
Background color 
dropdown list hover color 
text color 
border 
and more...

** Support dynamic data with caption and default value 


LIVE DEMO 
https://pmst-bmc.bubbleapps.io/nice_dropdown

FOR ISSUES AND MORE DISCUSSIONS 
https://forum.bubble.io/t/new-free-plugin-fully-customizable-dropdown-list/199610?u=momen
name: Nice Dropdown
plugin_instructions: just install the plugin and add nice dropdown element to your page then add your options
